Reviews.Title: Incorrect CPU in the search description
Reviews.Author: Andrew H
Reviews.Content: I don't own this laptop. I was shopping for a laptop and stumbled across it, and it caused me to wonder what CPU is in it.I submitted a change for the item description and Amazon accepted it... so that's correct at least. Still claims an Apple A4 (An 850-1000Mhz ARM processor built for phones) in the search listing, though. Ah well.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Celeron 1005M 1.9 GHz,Intel HD integrated graphics
4 GB DDR3L SDRAM
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
17.3-Inch Screen
Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
ProductInfo.Name: Acer Aspire NX.MGAAA.003;E1-731-2402 17.3-Inch Laptop
